entries.definition_en: AI embedded in product/service features provided to customers.
entries.definition_ja: 顧客に提供する製品・サービス機能に組み込まれたAI。

entries.definition_en: Evidence that an AI use/service was requested and described.
entries.definition_ja: AI利用/サービスの申請と内容説明の証跡。
意図しないデータ開示のリスク。

evidence.summary: Technical documentation for high-risk AI system per EU AI Act Annex IV: general description, development process, monitoring and control, risk management, conformity, post-market monitoring.

request.scope: High-risk AI system for recruitment screening (Annex III 4(a))
request.rationale: Conformity documentation and technical documentation under Article 11(1) and Annex IV.

review.rationale: Annex IV elements covered: 1) general description, 2) development, 3) monitoring/control, 4) risk management, 5) lifecycle changes, 6) standards, 7) EU declaration of conformity, 8) post-market monitoring plan.

change_log.change_description: Initial Evidence Bundle for EU AI Act Annex IV technical documentation sample.
